branchCategory.name: CK
branchCategory.description: <p>Clamp cylinder series&nbsp;CK1-Z is available in two styles of clevis widths (16.5mm, 19.5mm).&nbsp; It is a non-lube, compact, lightweight cylinder with a built-in speed controller.&nbsp; The CK1-Z is available in 3 bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 150mm.&nbsp; Options include easy speed adjustments, rod attachments and auto switch capabilities.</p>

branchItem.name: CKG1-Z/CKP1-Z, Clamp Cylinder w/Magnetic Field Resistant Auto Switch (Rod Mounting Style)
branchItem.description: <p>The CK1-Z series is a clamp cylinder available in two styles of clevis widths (16.5mm, 19.5mm).  It is a non-lube, compact, lightweight cylinder with a built-in speed controller.  The CK1-Z is available in 3 bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 150mm.  Options include easy speed adjustments, rod attachments and auto switch capabilities.</p>

branchItem.name: CK1-Z/CKG1-Z, Clamp Cylinder, Magnetic Field Resistant Auto Switch (Band Mounting Style)
branchItem.description: <p>The CK1-Z series is a clamp cylinder available in two styles of clevis widths (16.5mm, 19.5mm).  It is a non-lube, compact, lightweight cylinder with a built-in speed controller.  The CK1-Z is available in 3 bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 150mm.  Options include easy speed adjustments, rod attachments and auto switch capabilities.</p>
